short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Widen helps you follow all of someone's followers, followings, or likers. grow your Instagram today!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This "bot" can automatically mass follow followers, followings, or likers for you.

It waits between actions so as to not be blocked by Instagram's rate limits.

PS: This app will work till the Instagram changes its structure. We will try to update the app if Instagram changes but cant guarantee it
